data.eml:eml: On the generic placement of the narrow-range endemic ‘ Helix ’ arguineguinensis Seddon & Aparicio, 1998 from Gran Canaria (Canary Islands)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Neiber, Marco T. (2015): On the generic placement of the narrow-range endemic ‘ Helix ’ arguineguinensis Seddon & Aparicio, 1998 from Gran Canaria (Canary Islands). Zootaxa 3981 (2): 296-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.2.11
